artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait, mica on background and collar; head and shoulders of woman in black coat, wearing brown floral kimono; shiny pink ground
inscription: 昭和丙子八月 {Shōwa hinoene hachigatsu} (August 1936)
markings: hand-applied red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui}; red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | LLC, red publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe}; LL, publisher seal: 版権所有　不許模寫　渡邊庄三郎 {hanken shoyū fukyo mosha Watanabe Shōzaburō} (copyright, all reproduction rights reserved, Watanabe Shōzaburō) | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第百五拾壹番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai hyakugojūichi ban} (edition of 250, number 151) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
portfolio: From The Second Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai nishū 現代美人集第二輯)
signed: 深水畫 {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui); hand-written: 此君亭主人 {Shikuntei Shujin} | LLC pencil: ほお {hoo}
text: Later edition or maybe a gift by Shinsui because of the second signature that was added above her sleeve. It is unsual that the round Watanabe seal is in the left bottom corner. It usually is where the second signature is here.
title: Pupil of the Eye
